title: Great hotel, HORRIBLE STAFF.
text: I must say, location and hotel wise, this is a good place to stay. BUT THE STAFF IS HORRIBLE. They were rude and impatient when dealing with our reservation. There was also a lack of communication between staff. One staff will tell us something, and the other staff will tell us another, or respond with "I don't know who told you that, but this is how it is." HORRIBLE. They also almost cancelled our booking during the snowstorm. CALL AHEAD before arriving. Billing wise, they charged my card twice and still hasn't issued a refund.
